data.title: Sempre / Jamais (feat. Ang√®le) (Lyrics in English)
data.meta_description: The Tug of Love and Memory in 'Sempre / Jamais'. English translation: Seeing each other as friends / Always / Looking away so I forget / Never / Hugging you again will be like drinking honey / I would fly to Qatar skimming the
data.text:
Seeing each other as friends

Always

Looking away so I forget

Never

Hugging you again will be like drinking honey

I would fly to Qatar skimming the sea

To find you

I was dreaming of being elsewhere

In my Rick Owens coat

Holding you

I liked it when I wore your necklace

Being with you on the jet ski was better than Nirvana

Do you ever think about it?

How are you without me?

If you're dying of thirst, make me your fountain

Seeing each other as friends

Always

Looking away so I forget

Never

Even if it's illegal, think of me

Always

Until the police catch us

Never

My heart is in pieces, it seems to be my fault

Not hard to get but hard to keep

Barriers down, guard down, yesterday you wanted me and with a kiss

You tell me you want me, why don't you let go?

I loved every time we looked at each other

I loved when the scent of your body lingered on my fingers

What if we tried?

Would you blame me?

How to say goodbye when our two hearts remain attached

Seeing each other as friends

Always

Looking away so I forget

Never

Even if it's illegal, think of me

Always

Until the police catch us

Never

Never

Until the police catch us (ah)

Always

Until it catches us

Seeing each other as friends

Always

Looking away so I forget

Never

Even if it's illegal, think of me

Always

Until the police catch us

Never

I liked it when I wore your necklace

I loved when the scent of your body lingered on my fingers

Even if it's illegal, think of me

Always

Until the police catch us

Never
